frontmatter.title: The Royal Limited Review
frontmatter.description: The Royal Limited is a fantastic strategic and thematic solo game.

frontmatter.title: Battle Card Review
frontmatter.description: Battle Card mostly successfully attempts to recreate historical battles in a small scale.

frontmatter.title: Doom Machine Review
frontmatter.description: Doom Machine is a fantastic dice-chucker with punishing difficulty.

frontmatter.title: Mindburners: Into the Void Review (Solo Mode)
frontmatter.description: Mindburners Into the Void is a small but clever drafting tableau builder.

frontmatter.title: Fishing Lessons Review
frontmatter.description: Fishing Lessons is a satisfying programming game that has limited replayability.

frontmatter.title: SpaceShipped Review
frontmatter.description: SpaceShipped is a great space merchant adventure that is let down by extreme randomness.

frontmatter.title: Death Valley + Expansion Review (Solo Mode)
frontmatter.description: Death Valley provides great tableau building in a small package but has limited replayability.
